favourite.article: Lord keep us patiently waiting for Your coming.
This song is so inspiring. Just take a minute to meditate on it, and you can just feel the presence of God's great love.....we would keep waiting in patience until He COMES.
Let not our heart be desolate, but strong in faith, in patience wait, until HE COMES!!!
We read this song at the Lord's table meeting this morning, and then sang it. It was a high point of the meeting. We had never sung it before.
This song really encourages me. Whenever I get into this hymn, it keeps reminding me of the Lord's coming. Therefore I will continue enjoying the Lord till He comes.
